posts.post_title: Lot of (9) T202 For Sale, w/ Cobb and Mathewson
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Chris Buckler
For Sale: lot of (9) 1912 Hassan T202's. All cards are Graded/Authenticated.

1912 T202 Hassan TY COBB #65 and O'Leary SGC 1

1912 T202 Hassan CHRISTY MATHEWSON and Fletcher SGC VG 3

1912 T202 Hassan Raymond/Latham PSA 1

1912 T202 Hassan Suggs McLean Chase PSA 1

1912 T202 Hassan Suggs/McLean Hal Chase PSA 1

1912 T202 Hassan Murray/Snodgrass McGraw PSA 1

1912 T202 Hassan C. Milan and N. Elberfeld PSA 1

1912 T202 Hassan Lord/Tannehill Held At PSA 1.5

1912 T202 Hassan Dooin/Titus "Dooin Gets" PSA 1

Price for the lot = $900 shipped

Please contact me at bucklercards@yahoo.com
